name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world’s oxygen.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is home to the world's largest beer festival, Oktoberfest.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the birthplace of chess, yoga, and Ayurveda.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world, with over 90 million tourists annually.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capitals: Pretoria (executive), Bloemfontein (judicial), and Cape Town (legislative).

name: Mexico
interestingFact: Mexico is home to the world’s largest pyramid by volume, the Great Pyramid of Cholula.
